components.name: Identity, Security & Operations || Key Management Service

incidents.name: [Global][Domains] - Domains Name incident notification on IN tld

incident_updates.body: An incident is in progress on our Domain Names offer, customers in the impacted zone may face some difficulties. Please find the details: Start time : 03/03/2025 07:58 UTC Service impact : Customer with a .in domains name are unable to perform some tasks. Ongoing actions : Our teams are working to resolve the issue. We will keep you informed of developments and the resolution of the incident. We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your understanding.

We are currently experiencing an incident affecting our Domains, customers in the impacted zone are unable to perform some tasks. Here is detail for this incident : Start time : 03/03/2025 08:49 UTC Impacted Service(s) : Multiple operations (Registration, Renew, Transfer, Restore, Delete) are temporarily unavailable for .MG domains. Customers Impact : Customers are temporarily unable to perform multiple operations (Registration, Renew, Transfer, Restore, Delete). Please note that websites are still available. Unfortunately, customers who want to renew their .MG domain name after the expiration date is already passed will have their websites unavailable. Ongoing Actions : Our teams are investigating to determine the origin of the incident to fix it. Our teams are fully engaged and working to resolve the issue as quickly as possible. We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution. We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

We are currently experiencing an event affecting our Web Cloud offer. Start time : 03/03/2025 07:35 UTC Our teams are fully committed to investigating this issue and working towards a resolution as soon as possible. As investigations are ongoing, we will share any new findings or updates with you as soon as possible. We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

We have new information regarding the maintenance. Please find below an update on the situation: New start time : 04/03/2025 21:00 UTC End time : 05/03/2025 02:00 UTC Service impact : During this maintenance, you may experience some disruptions to our services on all impacted clusters. Specifically: • Suspension of traffic from AI and content indexing bots and crawlers on all impacted clusters: To prevent any potential issues, we will temporarily suspend traffic from AI and content indexing bots and crawlers on all impacted clusters. • Possible slowness on perso/pro offers : You may notice slower loading times or delayed responses when accessing your website or applications. In addition : • Possible slowness on metrics or logs on clusters 028, 029, 030 : Metrics and logs access may be delayed or slow during the maintenance period. • Possible slowness on mails on clusters 003, 006, 010, 011, 014 : Metrics and logs access may be delayed or slow during the maintenance period. • Slowness on operations on clusters 002 & 020 → 026 Service improvement : This maintenance is link to : https://network.status-ovhcloud.com/incidents/4mdv5631yzt9 We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Web Hosting Offer. Start time : 05/03/2025 22:00 UTC End time : 06/03/2025 05:00 UTC Service impact : Filerz following will be unavailable one by one during 20 minutes. Cluster020- Filerz71 Cluster023 - Filerz707 Cluster026 - Filerz1884 Cluster023 - Filerz148 Cluster003 - Filerz890 Cluster007 - Filerz396 Service improvement : We are going to reboot the Filerz one by one (Web Hosting server) to improve the performance and stability of the service. Thank you for your understanding.
